questionTitle: Are you against war, or ___ it?
Let's sit ___ the table. I have just prepared dinner.
Can you come ___ see me next Sunday? I have a nice gift for you.
I read a newspaper last night ___ three hours.
Excuse me ___ my being late but I missed my train.
___the end of my garden, there are some wonderful flowers.
I'm so excited ___ my trip to New York that I can't sleep.
